head: <link rel="stylesheet" href="sloganizer/normalize.css" type="text/css" media="all" /> <link rel="stylesheet" href="sloganizer/sloganizer.css?1" type="text/css" media="all" />
body:
Sloganizer.js

Word banks

Each word slot in the slogan has a word bank.

Edit the word banks below. Use commas to seperate each of the entries.

Note: Whatever word is part of the current sentence will be added to that words input field below when you click 'apply'.

Force a sentence

Make a sloganizer say something specific

This will add each of these words to each of the word banks respectively.
scripts: <script type="text/javascript" src="sloganizer/underscore-min.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="sloganizer/jquery.mousewheel.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="sloganizer/browser-detect.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="sloganizer/tools.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="sloganizer/sloganizer.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="sloganizer/app.js"></script>
